des:
Homeway empowers your Home Assistant with free remote access and full Alexa support. Voice control your lights, thermostats, alarms, scenes, actions, and more. 

To get started, go to homeway.io to make an account, install our Home Assistant add-on, and link it. Then enable this Alexa skill, log in to your Homeway account, and you're ready to voice control!

With Homeway's secure tunnel to your Home Assistant, you can:

Turn lights on and off.
Arm or disarm your alarm system.
Activate binary inputs.
View cameras from Alexa Show.
Adjust your thermostat.
Open or close IOT shades.
Control fans around your home.
Active scenes.
Activate Home Assitant scripts.
And more!

Free remote access, Official Home Assistant iOS and Android App Support, Alexa, Google Assistant, and more at https://homeway.io
